title: Convert repository to Claude Code plugin structure

title: Refresh README brand voice with aviation theme
Rename commands to aviation theme (flight-plan, takeoff)
description: Rename /reaper:plan to /reaper:flight-plan and /reaper:orchestrate to /reaper:takeoff for aviation-themed commands. Keep claude-sync as-is for practical naming.

title: Test after fix
close_reason: Cleanup: test issues and wrong prefix

title: Update command descriptions with aviation theming
Fix Agent Name Qualification
description:
Update agents/workflow-planner.md and commands/flight-plan.md to use fully qualified agent names (e.g., reaper:feature-developer instead of feature-developer).

Success Criteria:
- All subagent_type values prefixed with reaper:
- All prose agent references use fully qualified names
- No unqualified agent names remain in either file

title: Update agent references in workflow-planner.md
description:
Find and replace all unqualified agent names with their reaper:-prefixed equivalents throughout the workflow-planner agent definition.

Files: agents/workflow-planner.md

Agent Names to Update:
- feature-developer -> reaper:feature-developer
- bug-fixer -> reaper:bug-fixer
- refactoring-specialist -> reaper:refactoring-specialist
- branch-manager -> reaper:branch-manager
- test-runner -> reaper:test-runner
- code-reviewer -> reaper:code-reviewer
- security-auditor -> reaper:security-auditor
- workflow-planner -> reaper:workflow-planner
- documentation-generator -> reaper:documentation-generator

Acceptance Criteria:
- All subagent_type values use reaper: prefix
- All prose references to agents use fully qualified names
- File passes markdown linting
- No unqualified agent names remain (verified by grep)

---
Parallel Execution: Can run simultaneously with reaper-ibg.2 (no file overlap)
Related: reaper-ibg.2 (same naming convention update in different file)
